QuestData.Title: Signs of Big Watery Trouble
QuestData.Description: This crab trap appears to have been destroyed by something much larger than the nearby circling sharks.$B$BPerhaps Tua'kea, the fisherman at Moa'ki Harbor, should be told about this?
QuestData.LogDescription: Inform Tua'kea at Moa'ki Harbor about the wrecked crab trap.
QuestData.RewardText: That's not the news I wanted to hear, $r.$B$BNo, no... it's good that you told me, but I fear my old nemesis has returned to these waters.
